social-anxiety.title: Social anxiety
social-anxiety.description: Working through social fears and building confidence in interpersonal situations.
social-anxiety.welcomeMessage: Ready to overcome social anxiety? This theme will help you build confidence and develop healthy social skills through practical exercises.

stress-management.title: Stress
stress-management.description: Learning to manage daily stress and develop healthy coping mechanisms.
stress-management.welcomeMessage: Take control of your stress levels. Learn practical techniques to manage everyday pressures and build resilience.

anger-management.title: Angry
anger-management.description: Understanding and managing anger in healthy, constructive ways.
anger-management.welcomeMessage: Transform your relationship with anger. Learn to channel this powerful emotion constructively.

sadness-apathy.title: Sadness and apathy
sadness-apathy.description: Working through feelings of sadness, depression, and emotional numbness.
sadness-apathy.welcomeMessage: Navigate through difficult emotions. Rediscover your motivation and emotional well-being.

anxiety-panic.title: Anxiety and panic
anxiety-panic.description: Managing anxiety attacks, panic disorders, and overwhelming worry.
anxiety-panic.welcomeMessage: Take control of your anxiety. Learn proven techniques to manage panic and reduce worry.

self-esteem.title: Self-esteem
self-esteem.description: Building confidence, self-worth, and positive self-image.
self-esteem.welcomeMessage: Boost your self-esteem and confidence. Develop a healthy relationship with yourself.
